text: 5:4 Matyu 15:4; Efesus 6:1-2; 1 Timoti 2:3Eghtɨ amizir kam boriba ko igiaba ikɨtɨ, nɨ borir kabar akurvaghtɨ, me deraghvɨra kamaghɨn fogh suam, men ingangarir faragh Godɨn damazimɨn damuamim a kara, me bar deraghvɨra uan amebamɨn ganam. Egh arazir kamɨn, me uan amebam ko afeziamɨn akurvazim ko ingangarir dafar aning fomɨra me gamiziba ikarvagham. God arazir kam bar a gifonge.
